item.description: This may be one of our last chances in Massachusetts to experience Greyhound racing. Let's meet for dinner in the clubhouse and then wager all evening on "Big Q, Pick-3, Pick-4, Twin Trifecta, Tri-Super." We will need our final reservation count by May 15th - be sure to RSVP "yes" if you think you can be there. There will be a $2 meetup fee for this event.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Wonderland Greyhound Park for Dinner,Daily Doubles, Quiniela's, Trifecta's
